committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to extend the authority of the Women in Military Service for America Foundation to establish a memorial in the District of Columbia area.

summary.text: Extends through November 5, 1996, the authority of the Women in Military Service for America Foundation to establish a memorial on Federal land in the District of Columbia and its environs.

titles.title: A bill to extend the authority of the Women in Military Service for America Foundation to establish a memorial in the District of Columbia area.
